      • genericSearch

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public java.lang.String genericSearch(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                            @RequestParam(value="s")
                                            java.lang.String pattern)
        Calls a generic search method for the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        model - of the view that will be shown
        pattern - to search for
        Returns:
        the view search

      • detailedSearch

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                params={"s","attributes"})
public java.lang.String detailedSearch(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                             @RequestParam(value="s")
                                             java.lang.String pattern,
                                             @RequestParam(value="attributes")
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> attributes)
        Calls a search method for the given pattern. Only specific fields will be used for the search.
        Parameters:
        model - of the view that will be shown
        pattern - to search for
        attributes - to search on (model fields)
        Returns:
        the view search
